alert.note: Alert for Lower Yukon Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 14 at 4:22PM AKST until December 16 at 4:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 4 PM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Plan on difficult travel conditions. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches, are expected. Cold Wind chills to 50 below area expected late tonight and early Wednesday. * WHERE...Lower Yukon Valley. * WHEN...Midnight to 4 PM Thursday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Look for reduced visibilities at times. Winds increasing tonight will cause Cold wind chills as low as 50 below zero from late tonight through early Wednesday. Snow developing Wednesday will continue into Thursday. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause travel difficulties.
